Definition at line 334 of file zgematrix_small-functions.hpp.

References i().

{VERBOSE_REPORT;
  zgematrix_small<n,n> X;
  for(long i=0; i<n; i++){
    for(long j=0; j<i; j++){
      X(i,j) =A(i,j)+B(i,j);
    }
    for(long j=i; j<n; j++){
      X(i,j) =A(i,j)+B(j,i);
    }
  }
  return X;
}

template<long n>
zgematrix_small<n,n> operator- ( const zgematrix_small< n, n > &  A,
const zhematrix_small< n > &  B 
) [inline]

Definition at line 365 of file zgematrix_small-functions.hpp.

References i().

{VERBOSE_REPORT;
  zgematrix_small<n,n> X;
  for(long i=0; i<n; i++){
    for(long j=0; j<=i; j++){
      X(i,j)=A(i,j)-B(i,j);
    }
    for(long j=i+1; j<n; j++){
      X(i,j)=A(i,j)-B(j,i);
    }
  }
  return X;
}

{VERBOSE_REPORT;
  zgematrix_small<m,n> X(0.);
  for(long i=0; i<m; i++){
    for(long j=0; j<n; j++){
      for(long k=0; k<j; k++){
        X(i,j) +=A(i,k)*B(j,k);
      }
      for(long k=j; k<n; k++){
        X(i,j) +=A(i,k)*B(k,j);
      }
    }
  }
  return X;
}
